German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Ausweis
Wikipedia de
Ausweis

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔaʊ̯svaɪ̯s/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Ausweis m (genitive Ausweises, plural Ausweise)

  1. ID card (a card or badge showing the official identity of the wearer)
